bibl.title: Use and Meaning of the Middle Point in the Hawara Homer.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. II
bibl.author: Salomons, R.P.

bibl.note: P. Hawara (= Pack2 616). The middle point may be defined as a visible sign for the reader to make an audible pause at that place in the sentence.
Salomons R.P., Use and Meaning of the Middle Point in the Hawara Homer.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. II (Napoli, 1984) pp. 249-253.
